subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Florida State’s Christian Ponder threw two touchdown passes, including a clinching 23-yarder to Texas Christian’s Jeremy Kerley, in the South’s 24-10 Senior Bowl victory over the North in Mobile, Ala.
snippet: Florida State’s Christian Ponder threw two touchdown passes, including a clinching 23-yarder to Texas Christian’s Jeremy Kerley, in the South’s 24-10 Senior Bowl victory over the North in Mobile, Ala.
